data.eml:eml: A review of Galaxiella pusilla (Mack) (Teleostei: Galaxiidae) in south-eastern Australia with a description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coleman, Rhys A., Hoffmann, Ary A., Raadik, Tarmo A. (2015): A review of Galaxiella pusilla (Mack) (Teleostei: Galaxiidae) in south-eastern Australia with a description of a new species. Zootaxa 4021 (2): 243-281, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4021.2.2
